br.eti.villani.util

Class IrmaCode

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.eti.villani.util.IrmaCode

  • public class IrmaCode
extends java.lang.Object
    Converts the IRMA code to binary code and binary code to IRMA code.
    Author:
    VILLANI, L. and PRATI, R. C.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IrmaCode(java.lang.String nameXmlIrmaCode)
      Instantiate a IrmaCode object.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String toBinary(java.lang.String code)
      Converts to binary the IRMA code in format "1111-123-123-123".
      java.lang.String toIrmaProjectFormat(java.lang.String binaryCode)
      Convert to IRMA code format a binary code separated by comma: "1,1,0,1,0,1..."
